videos.description: D'Angelo Russell steals the pass, goes behind his back on the dime to Anthony Edwards, who throws down the one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Russell’s steal and behind-the-back pass = Edwards slam ) 2021/5/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Russell's steal and behind-the-back pass = Edwards slam
